title: Trump campaign cites progressive groups, Joy Reid's blog in attacks on Ron DeSantis
description: The Trump campaign cited multiple progressive groups and far-left MSNBC host Joy Reid's blog while ripping Republican Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis over his record in the state.

title: There have been 1,080 attempts to punish scholars over the past 23 years: Report

title: Biden admin appears to give pass to Chinese-backed green energy plant
description: Executives of a Chinese-backed electric vehicle battery company said this week the Biden administration informed them that an investment in the U.S. wasn't subject to further review.

title: Florida man charged in Alabama cold case after 8 years
description: Eight years after a Florida man was found dead in a coastal Alabama community, law enforcement officials in Alabama have arrested and charged a suspect.

title: Vermont Gov. Scott signs bill raising marriage age to 18 into law
description: Republican Vermont Gov. Phil Scott on Friday approved a bill raising the Green Mountain State's marriage age to 18, eliminating its parental consent loophole for teenagers.

title: Supreme Court preserves full access to medical abortion pill mifepristone
description: The Supreme Court ruled that full access to the abortion pill mifepristone can continue while a lawsuit works its way through the lower federal courts.

title: US launches new program targeting abandoned crab, lobster traps
description: The U.S. is launching a new program that will target the scourge of abandoned crab and lobster traps. William & Mary’s Virginia Institute of Marine Science will anchor the program.

title: Emergency preparedness: Enable life-saving settings on your iPhone and Apple Watch

title: Mall of America closed as police respond to incident with male believed to be armed
description: Minnesota police are responding to what is believed to be an armed male outside the Mall of America on Friday.

title: California researchers working on new ocean-based climate solution
description: The engineering faculty at UCLA said they have developed a technique that can remove carbon dioxide from seawater and produce green hydrogen in the process.

description: Connecticut police say one person was killed and several others were injured following an fiery crash involving a tractor-trailer truck carrying fuel Friday on an Interstate 95 bridge in Groton.

title: White House does not plan to evacuate all Americans in Sudan
description: The Pentagon has deployed forces to aid in the possible evacuation of U.S. Embassy personnel from Sudan. But, the White House said there are no plans for evacuating everyone.

title: Russian mercenaries sympathetic to Putin target UK with cyber threats over war in Ukraine: report
description: Russian mercenary groups are ramping up their efforts to target opponents of President Vladimir Putin as the war in Ukraine rages, by targeting U.K. infrastructure through cyber-security.

title: Mexican man beaten, burned to death by huge mob for stealing broccoli
description: A mob estimated to have 150 townspeople beat and burned an impoverished man to death after he tried to steal broccoli stalks from a field in Mexico.

title: Family of Louisville bank shooter wants his AR-15 rifle destroyed
description: The family of a Louisville, Kentucky, bank shooter who killed his co-workers wants to destroy his rifle, which is planned to go up for auction and may circulate back on the streets.

title: Georgia rescinds testing requirements to enter most public colleges
description: Georgia will not require students to take SAT or ACT tests to apply for nearly all the state’s public college institutions through the 2024-2025 school year.

title: Raptors fire championship-winning head coach
description: Nick Nurse is out as head coach of the Toronto Raptors, reportedly fired by the organization on Friday after five seasons. Nurse went 227-163 and won the 2019 NBA championship

title: Colorado woman, 20, killed by rock thrown at car in series of seemingly random attacks
description: A 20-year-old Colorado woman has died after a suspect threw a rock into her windshield in a series of apparently random attacks on vehicles across two counties on Thursday.

title: The GOAT of corruption, Frank Sinatra's Chicago, and more from Fox News Opinion

title: Illegal aliens who are LGBTQ ‘may not be detained’ under Democrats’ new bill

title: Fetterman admits he was ‘not the kind of Senator' Pennsylvanians deserved when hospitalized
description: In an NPR interview, Sen. John Fetterman, D-Penn., discussed his battle with depression that he claimed affected his work as a lawmaker and his responsibility as a father.

title: Soros' radical agenda: Here's how far his power and influence extend

title: Former parole officer in West Virginia sentenced to 15 years after sexually assaulting female parolee

title: Indian climber who was trapped for 3 day on Mount Annapurna joined by family after rescue

title: DC vehicle plunges into Anacostia River under major bridge, killing 3

title: Mexico sells unwanted presidential jet to Tajikistan
description: An unwanted Mexican presidential jet was finally sold after four years of trying. President Andrés Manuel López Obrador refused to use the jet after taking office, saying it was too luxurious.

title: Family members of 2018 Texas school shooting victims fear more delays in trial
